1    | /**************************************************************************
2    | $Header: wn_shad.c Sun 11-19-2000 10:50:01 pm HvA V1.00 $
3    | ***************************************************************************/
4    | 
5    | #include "video/v_video.h"
6    | #include "window.h"
7    | 
8    | extern SCREEN _cursvar;
9    | 
10   | /*#+func-----------------------------------------------------------------------
11   |     FUNCTION: wn_shadow()
12   |      PURPOSE: Give a given window a shadowed border on bottom and right side
13   |       SYNTAX: int wn_shadow(WINDOW *w);
14   |  DESCRIPTION:
15   |      RETURNS: FALSE if no window opened,
16   |               TRUE if all OK
17   |      HISTORY: 09-Oct-1993 V0.1 - Initial version
18   | --#-func----------------------------------------------------------------------*/
19   | int wn_shadow(WINDOW *w)
20   | {
21   |   #define SHADOWC 16*BLACK+DARKGRAY
22   | 
23   |   if (!w)           /* Check if window opened */
24   |     return(FALSE);
25   | 
26   |   if(w->wx2 < _cursvar.cols && w->wy2 < _cursvar.lines) {   /* Check if shadow within screen */
27   |     v_setattrib_area(w->wy2+1,w->wx1+1,w->xsize,1,SHADOWC);  /* bottom */
28   |     v_setattrib_area(w->wy1+1,w->wx2+1,1,w->ysize,SHADOWC);  /* right  */
29   |     return(TRUE);
30   |   }
31   |   else
32   |     return(FALSE);
33   | 
34   | }
